description: This file defines a 'Note' class representing a note object with properties like id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt. It includes constructors, getters, setters, and maintains timestamps for creation and updates.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model for a single note, implementing Serializable, with fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt. Provides constructors, getters, and setters.

methods.name: Note(String title, String content)
methods.description: Constructor that generates a new UUID, sets title and content (default empty if null), and initializes timestamps.

methods.name: Note(String id, String title, String content, long createdAt, long updatedAt)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes all fields explicitly.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the note's title and updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the note's content and updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the note was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the note was last updated.
